title: Roast Chicken Legs with Lemon
ingredients: ['6 whole chicken legs', 'Seasoning', '3 tablespoons white wine', '4 tablespoons melted butter', '2 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '250ml lemon juice', '2 tablespoons salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '2 tablespoons dried thyme', '2 lemons, sliced', '1 tablespoon dried basil']
